summary: Ever annoyed when your loyal servant dies? Ever accidentally killed her? Well, no more! With Unkillable Lydia, this mod will never let her die!
descriptionHtml:
Ever annoyed when your loyal servant dies? Ever accidentally killed her? Well, no more! With Unkillable Lydia, this mod will never let her die!

================ANNOUNCEMENT================
Hey guys, I\'m so sorry that I haven\'t updated yet. I\'ve been running Windows 8 Consumer and it\'s been having some difficulties. I have a lot of crashes, so I will be installing Windows 7 again so I may continue. Thanks.

Alpha V1.1 Features:
*Lydia is invulnerable

Coming Soon:
*For all Followers
*Extended Spell List for all Followers
*Higher Levels for all Followers

I would love to have some suggestions please.
author: Scorchstar
